name: 42N8
description:
You’re fresh out of The Ivory Tower College of Business, armed with a Master’s Degree in Economics and Bullshit. The world is your oyster, and you are ready to claim the pearls of other people’s wealth. You are incredibly lucky to have been hired by Fortunate Capital Management, a Fortune 100 a stock management firm. Your job is to play with invest in a stock each day for your client, and try not to ruin them.

Of course, there’s no risk to you, but your client can lose it all…

42N8 is a solo journaling RPG about examining our relationship to the stock market. It uses a Magic 8-Ball and a twenty-sided dice. It was created as part of the #fuckAdobe game jam. 

It's available for PWYW, with a suggested price of $4.28
